Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This product represents a significant investment of time, resources, and innovation, making it an unparalleled offering in its category. I understand that the value of this product may be subjective and varies from person to person. Therefore, I am offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $850000. This exclusive offer is valid for a limited time only, so I encourage you to consider this exceptional opportunity to elevate your experience with [Product Name]. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this extraordinary product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $850,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $850,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
